sentence.Network_en: He was long-limbed and dark-eyed, with a mop of tight, dark curls.
sentence.Network_cn: 他四肢修长、眼睛乌黑发亮，留着一头蓬乱浓密的黑色卷发。

entry.tran: （与形容词连用构成形容词）表示“有…肢的”
entry.def: -limbed combines with adjectives to form other adjectives which indicate that a person or animal has limbs of a particular type or appearance.

means.word_mean: 1. having or as if having limbs, especially limbs of a specified kind (usually used in combination);
